Title: Relates to reports of substantial risk or threat of harm by mental health professionals; repealer
Summary: Relates to reports of substantial risk or threat of harm by mental health professionals.
LawCode: Rpld & add ยง9.46, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to reports of substantial risk or threat of harm by mental health professionals; and repealing certain provisions of such law relating thereto
